com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern
Interface IDeployValidationActivePattern

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeployValidationActivePattern
public interface IDeployValidationActivePattern

A pattern that can be found or constructed.

An active pattern is instantiated with one or more topology objects. The pattern implementation navigates from these objects to check their interdependent configuration. The pattern may be invoked in passive mode to check if it holds, or active where it attempts to correct configuration errors.

Field Summary
static IStatus FAIL_HAS_FIX
          Status indicating that the pattern was not found, and a fix is available.
static IStatus FAIL_NO_FIX
          Status indicating that the pattern was not found, and no known fix is available.
 
Method Summary
 IStatus find(boolean fix, IProgressMonitor monitor)
          Applies the pattern, optionally fixing any errors found.

Method Detail

find

IStatus find(boolean fix,
             IProgressMonitor monitor)
Applies the pattern, optionally fixing any errors found.

Parameters:
fix - true if errors should be fixed, false for read-only check.
monitor - the validation or resolution progress and cancellation monitor.
Returns:
the status of the check and/or fix.
